QuestionStem: Explore the images to explore water’s role on Earth.

images.caption: Water shapes Earth’s surface through weathering and erosion, and it also influences Earth’s weather.
images.altText: In this photograph, stormy weather approaches the Grand Canyon. While part of the canyon is still experiencing calm weather and bright sunlight, another part is covered by dark clouds and torrential rain fall.

images.caption: Water is vital for sustaining all organisms on Earth.
images.altText: In this photograph, a young boy drinks water.
